actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs

official_title: To remove from the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System the areas comprising Bay County Unit P-31P in Florida.

summary.text: Amends the Coastal Barrier Resources Act to remove from the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System and related maps the areas comprising Bay County Unit P-31P in Florida.

titles.title: To remove from the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System the areas comprising Bay County Unit P-31P in Florida.
